message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_COMMEXCEP_XRV_END_DATE
message.locale: Communication exception to date must be before "%1s" end date - "%2d".

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_COMMEXCEP_XRV_START_DATE
message.locale: Communication exception from date must be after "%1s" start date - "%2d".

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_COMMEXCEP_XRV_START_END_DATE
message.locale: Communication exception from date must be before "%1s" end date - "%2d".

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_FV_REASONCODE_EMPTY
message.locale: Communication exception reason must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_FV_TYPECODE_EMPTY
message.locale: Communication exception method must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLECOMMEX_FV_REASONCODE_EMPTY
message.locale: Communication exception reason must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLECOMMEX_FV_TYPECODE_EMPTY
message.locale: Communication exception type must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLECOMMEXCEPTION_FV_FROMDATE_EMPTY
message.locale: Communication exception from date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLECOMMEXCEPTION_XFV_RECORDSFOUND
message.locale: A communication exception of this type currently exists.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLECOMMEXCEPTION_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_CREATE
message.locale: New communication exception details cannot be added for a client that is currently marked as a duplicate.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLECOMMEXCEPTION_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_MODIFY
message.locale: Communication exception details of a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLECOMMEXCEPTION_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_DELETE
message.locale: Communication exception details for a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be deleted.
